title: Build for Linux ARM32 (armhf) and ARM64 (aarch64)
body:
**Description of Change**

Add a new Linux architecture: armhf

This is build on Ubuntu 16.04 using the ARM prebuilt toolchain: https://developer.arm.com/tools-and-software/open-source-software/developer-tools/gnu-toolchain/gnu-a/downloads

Using GCC because of: https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/pull/1382#discussion_r449709079

**Test Binaries**

Built using Clang: 
 - ARM 32 v7a: [native_linux_arm_linux.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/4874470/native_linux_arm_linux.zip)
 - ARM 64 v8: [native_linux_arm64_linux.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/4874471/native_linux_arm64_linux.zip)

Built using GCC:
 - ARM 32 v7a: [native_linux_arm_gcc_linux.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/4874474/native_linux_arm_gcc_linux.zip)
 - ARM 64 v8: [native_linux_arm64_gcc_linux.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/4874476/native_linux_arm64_gcc_linux.zip)

**Test NuGet**

All the packages are on the preview feed as `v2.80.0-pr.1382.31`: `https://aka.ms/skiasharp-eap/index.json`

**Bugs Fixed**

- Related to issue #453
